Tender Title: Area 7 - A52 Lees Barn - Deflectograph Survey
Tender Description:
Highways England is looking to procure services to undertake deflectograph surveys, produce associated reports and upload all outputs onto HAPMS as per the documents attached. 

Please note, you will need to be a registered TST supplier in order to bid for this opportunity. For further details please contact nationaltst@highwaysengland.co.uk.
Classification Description: Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work

Tender Description: All Assets Condition and Connectivity Surveys across various locations in Area 14 - North East England.
